H0.text: Which 'Regal' male singer provided the half-time entertainment for the 2007 Superbowl. Prince

H1.text: Which 'Regal' male singer provided the half-time entertainment for the 2007 Superbowl. Elvis Presley

H2.text: Which 'Regal' male singer provided the half-time entertainment for the 2007 Superbowl. Freddie Mercury

H3.text: Which 'Regal' male singer provided the half-time entertainment for the 2007 Superbowl. Prens

A4.text: On February 4, 2007, Prince played at the Super Bowl XLI halftime show in Miami
